meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7668.

td.p: Michael Shockley, a pro sports executive from Seattle, Washington
Steph Bundy, a summer camp director from Oak Park, California
Saralee Etter, a writer from Pataskala, Ohio (whose 1-day cash winnings total $8,000)

tr.td: DIETS
THE ZONE
THE MEDITERRANEAN
DASH
PALEOLITHIC
WAIT WATCHERS
